verbs.description: [V: Appearing] [ARGM-LOC: on CNN] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] , [ARG1: a survivor of the Parkland , Fla. school shooting] slammed Donald Trump after the president delivered a raging speech in support of the National Rifle Association , calling him a “ professional liar . ”
